meanings.definition: The state or quality of being excessively intense.
meanings.sent1: The overintensity of the music made my ears hurt.
meanings.sent2: The overintensity of his emotions was evident in his passionate speech.
meanings.sent3: The overintensity of the toddler's tantrum was both amusing and exhausting.
meanings.sent4: The overintensity of the storm shook the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The overintensity of the colors in the painting left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.sent1: Her overintensity in the competition sometimes intimidated the other players.
meanings.sent2: The overintensity of his dedication to his work was admirable.
meanings.sent3: The overintensity of the debate turned into a comical shouting match.
meanings.sent4: The overintensity of her passion for the cause ignited a spark in the community.
meanings.sent5: The overintensity of the crowd's cheers filled the stadium with energy.
